title: Allegories of the Tarot
description: 22 CARDS......each an individual splinter of the human psyche.22 WRITERS......honing each splinter into a story of triumph and decay, arrogance and humility.Stories of the brightest lights and the darkest corners of the weirdest minds.22 cross-genre worlds.22 portals into the Universal.Only one way to get there.Allegories of the TarotAn Anthology of Symbols and the Human ExperienceVisit http://www.allegoriesofthetarot.com for more information.
author: Annetta Ribken
